entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM RESERVATION JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS ='Y'

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, HEADCOUNT, USER_NAME, TOTAL_PRICE, RESERVATION_TIME1, RESERVATION_TIME2, RESERVATION_DATE, SPACE_NAME, RES_REQUEST FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN RESERVATION_DATE USING(RESERVATION_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN SPACE S ON R.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS ='Y';
